title: Rectify partner name to Poonam Punamiya

requirements.text: In the Partners component (frontend/src/components/Partners.tsx), update the partner name from the current incorrect spelling to 'Poonam Punamiya' in the static partners data array.
acceptanceCriteria: The Partners section displays the name 'Poonam Punamiya' exactly as specified.
No other partner names or data are altered.
The partner card for Poonam Punamiya renders correctly with all existing details (photo, designation, specializations, experience) intact.

constraints: Only the partner name field for Poonam Punamiya should be changed; all other partner data must remain untouched.
nonGoals: Changing backend partner data or any backend logic.
Altering the Partners component layout or styling.
